    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • listen

        public void listen()
        Main listen thread each client will have their own listener on separate threads. This method handles the receiving of data from the client that this listener is assigned to.

      • process_data

        public void process_data(Packet packet)
        Processes the data received, and acts on the data
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet in which to process

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket(Packet send)
        Starts a new sender thread which sends data to this threads client
        Parameters:
        send - Data Packet to send

      • sendClientID

        public void sendClientID()
        Initiates a send command to send the client id generated by this server to the client connected to this listener.
